product_name: Complete Walker IV - Updated and Enlarged
long_description: Fully revised and updated, this new edition leads us through a discussion of every aspect of the outdoor life. Authors: Colin Fletcher and Chip Rawlins. Softcover; 845 pages. Alfred A. Knopf; copyright 2002. We've seen revolutionary changes in hiking and camping equipment, so the equipment recommendations are therefore completely revamped. We've also seen a deepening of environmental consciousness; the authors lead us through these technological, ethical and spiritual changes. Discussions on how to best equip yourself, from your socks to your pack; equipment evaluations are precise, honest and thorough. They remind us that hiking is not about equipment alone but about seeing the green world anew; this is an indispensable book!
short_description: Fully revised and updated, this new edition leads us through a discussion of every aspect of the outdoor life.
